name: Platform Uptime
description: Percentage of time platform is available and operational

name: User Engagement Score
description: Composite score measuring user interaction and satisfaction

name: Customer Churn Rate
description: Monthly customer churn percentage

name: Migration Progress
description: Percentage of data migrated to new infrastructure

name: System Performance Improvement
description: Reduction in average query response time

name: Sales Conversion Rate
description: Percentage of leads converted to customers

name: Average Sales Cycle Time
description: Average days from lead to closed deal

name: Compliance Audit Score
description: Score from regulatory compliance audit

name: Policy Implementation Rate
description: Percentage of required policies implemented

name: Time-to-Hire
description: Average days from job posting to offer acceptance

name: Candidate Quality Score
description: Average quality rating of candidates in pipeline

name: Supply Chain Cost Reduction
description: Percentage reduction in total supply chain costs

name: On-Time Delivery Rate
description: Percentage of orders delivered on or before promised date

name: App Store Rating
description: Average user rating in app stores

name: App Load Time
description: Average time for app to load and become interactive

name: Security Incident Count
description: Number of security incidents in current quarter

name: Vulnerability Remediation Time
description: Average days to remediate identified vulnerabilities

name: New Strategic Partnerships
description: Number of new strategic partnerships signed

name: Partner-Generated Revenue
description: Revenue generated through partner channels

name: AI Model Accuracy
description: Accuracy of AI/ML models in production

name: AI Feature Adoption Rate
description: Percentage of users actively using AI features

name: Customer Retention Rate
description: Percentage of customers retained month-over-month

name: Net Revenue Retention
description: Net revenue retention including expansion

name: Financial Report Accuracy
description: Percentage of financial reports with zero errors

name: Manual Process Reduction
description: Percentage reduction in manual financial processes
